title: Magazine Ad, "Tearsheet of magazine ad for Schlumberger, "Continuous Dipmeter"", 1958
medium: Lithography in black, purple, red and yellow ink on white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted vertically at upper right: Elaine Lustig
At top center: Continuous Dipmeter/ Simultaneous recording of air data for/ formation dip angle/ formation dip orientation/ hole deviation/ hole size
At center right in purple: SCHLUMBERGER
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The ad shows a drawing of the dipmeter underground and wavelength activity above in yellow, purple and red.

tombstone.epitaph:
Magazine Ad, "Tearsheet of magazine ad for Schlumberger, "Continuous Dipmeter"", 1958.
1958. Lithography in black, purple, red and yellow ink on white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-125.
